name: ROCKET WITCH
description:
A 2D score-based survival shooter that accidentally got a lot edgier than it needed to be. You play a witch that rides rockets and shoots monsters with her broom. The broom shoots either the broken hearts of men who wronged her or teeth from the skulls of her enemies.

Made for the 2018 WTF Game Jam www.wtfgamejam.com

Art and Design by Michael Elliott

Sound Effect by Flashkit Sound FX www.flashkit.com/soundfx

Music "12th Moon Rising" by Cryosnycopy www.freemusicarchive.org
